name: VIDEO: The 2022 Live Well Advance Returns With Thousands of Attendees
description: Over 2,000 people filed into the Convention Center for the County’s seventh annual Live Well Advance conference and School Summit.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Over 2,000 people filed into the Convention Center for the County’s seventh annual Live Well Advance conference and School Summit. The all-day event for health and wellness advocates included an award-winning keynote speaker, 50 breakout sessions and many opportunities to network, build relationships and learn best practices. But this year was extra special. After two years on a virtual platform, the 2022 Live Well Advance was back in person.
